document_data.name: Pincer staff
document_data.mainbody: '''Pincer staffs''' were a type of specialized [[polearm]]<ref>{{Cite dragon/331/The Point of Pole Arms|27}} unique to the [[kuo-toa]] that were designed to ensnare opponents, similar in design and principle to [[mancatcher]]s. including the specialized [[Sea Mother whip]]s, though they also saw occasional use by kuo-toa [[fighter]]s.
document_data.Description:
These polarms had a reach of {{SIrange|5|10|ft|long=yes}} and required two hands to wield them properly. Over two-thirds of their reach was taken up by the polearm's shaft, with the rest taken up by the "pincer", which often measured {{SI|3|ft|long=yes}} in length. On average they weighed about {{SI|20|lb}}.

Their namesake pincers could grapple creatures within the [[demihuman]] size range, going as large as a [[gnoll]].
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Claw (kuo-toa)|Claw]], a [[half-fiend]] kuo-toan cleric, wielded a pincer staff.
* [[Pliil Seachild]], a [[cleric]] of the [[Sea Mother]] that wielded a ''+2 pincer staff''.<ref>
